name: whippy-ai-mcp-dxt
description: Connect Claude Desktop to Whippy AI for contact management, messaging, campaign automation, and AI voice agents
long_description: This extension provides Claude Desktop with access to Whippy AI's powerful contact management, messaging, campaign automation, and AI voice agent features. You can create and manage contacts, send SMS and email messages, create marketing campaigns, track leads, analyze performance, manage AI voice agents, and initiate AI-powered phone calls - all through natural language conversations with Claude.

prompts.name: Contact Management
prompts.text:
I can help you manage contacts in Whippy. You can:
- Create new contacts with names, emails, and phone numbers
- Get contact details by ID
- List all contacts with pagination
- Search contacts by name, email, or phone with full details including tags and notes

What would you like to do with your contacts?

prompts.name: Send Messages
prompts.text:
I can help you send messages through Whippy:
- Send basic SMS messages to phone numbers
- Send comprehensive SMS with attachments, scheduling, and contact management
- Send comprehensive emails with attachments, CC/BCC, reply-to, and sender name
- All phone numbers are automatically formatted to E.164 format

What type of message would you like to send?

prompts.name: Campaign Management
prompts.text:
I can help you manage marketing campaigns in Whippy:
- Create new campaigns with messages
- List all your campaigns
- Send campaigns to your contacts
- Get campaign analytics and performance data

What would you like to do with your campaigns?

prompts.name: Lead Management
prompts.text:
I can help you manage leads in Whippy:
- Create new leads with contact information
- Track lead sources and status

Would you like to create a new lead or manage existing ones?

prompts.name: Conversation Tracking
prompts.text:
I can help you track conversations in Whippy:
- View conversation history
- Monitor engagement with your contacts
- Get insights into your communication effectiveness

What would you like to know about your conversations?

prompts.name: Analytics & Reporting
prompts.description: Get insights into your Whippy performance
prompts.text:
I can help you analyze your Whippy performance:
- Get campaign analytics and metrics
- Track delivery rates and engagement
- Monitor overall account performance

What analytics would you like to see?

prompts.name: AI Voice Agents
prompts.description: Manage AI voice agents and initiate calls
prompts.text:
I can help you manage AI voice agents in Whippy:
- List all AI agents with voice settings and LLM configuration
- Get detailed agent information including provider settings
- Initiate outbound calls with AI agents
- Pass custom data to agents during calls

What would you like to do with your AI agents?
